description: The Immortals have dabbled in many dark arts... at least those that did not kill them. A gift they had brought from the forgotten times of the desert was what seemed to be a charm that protected anyone from spells, at least in part.
tooltip: The Immortals have dabbled in many dark arts... at least those that did not kill them. A gift they had brought from the forgotten times of the desert was what seemed to be a charm that protected anyone from spells, at least in part. (Immortals now provide all units within their radius minor Magic Armor)
